text: allāhgē niyōgayanṭa avanata vīma san̆dahā misa, (minisun veta) api kisima dūtayeku evuvē næta. ebævin (meyaṭa venaskam kara) ovun tamanṭa tamanma aparādha kara gat avasthāvēdī oba veta pæmiṇa allāh vetin pav kṣamāva illā siṭimin ovun venuven (allāhgē) dūtayāda (dūtayā vana obat) pav kṣamāva illā siṭiyē nam, dayābaravantayeku hā kṣamā karanneku vaśayenda allāhva ovun dakinnaṭa tibuṇi
